AvvA requires access to the Accessibility API to perform automated actions, such as opening apps and playing music as configured by you. These actions will only be performed with your explicit permission. \n\n The use of this permission allows AvvA to execute programmed taps, which you have pre-configured, to make navigation and device use easier. This access does not change any device settings without your authorization and can be disabled at any time in the device’s accessibility settings.
